id: edit-guide

import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Edit Guide"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/games/{game-id}/guides/{guide-id}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Update an existing guide. Successful request will return the updated [Guide Object](/restapi/docs/schemas/guide-object).



:::tip

[Rules engine](/moderation/rules-engine) applies here.

:::

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"game-id","in":"path","description":"Game ID","required":true,"schema":{"type":"integer"},"example":1},{"name":"guide-id","in":"path","description":"Guide ID","required":true,"schema":{"type":"integer"},"example":2}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"multipart/form-data":{"schema":{"title":"Edit Guide Request","properties":{"name":{"type":"string","example":"Modding Guide for Rogue Knight"},"status":{"title":"Guide Permission Enum","description":"Status of the guide, see [status and visibility](/restapi/status-and-visibility) for details).","type":"integer","enum":[0,1,3],"example":"1","x-enumDescriptions":{"NOT_ACCEPTED (0)":"Not accepted.","ACCEPTED (1)":"Accepted and live.","DELETED (3)":"Deleted."}},"summary":{"description":"Summary for your guide, giving a brief overview of what it's about. Cannot exceed 250 characters.","type":"string","example":"Short descriptive summary here"},"description":{"description":"Detailed description for your guide, which can include details such as 'About', 'Features', 'Install Instructions', 'FAQ', etc. HTML supported and encouraged.","type":"string","example":"<h2>Getting started with.."},"logo":{"description":"Image file which will represent your guides logo. Must be jpg, jpeg or png format and cannot exceed 8MB in filesize. Dimensions must be at least 512x288 and we recommended you supply a high resolution image with a 16 / 9 ratio. mod.io will use this image to make three thumbnails for the dimensions 320x180, 640x360 and 1280x720.","type":"object","example":"@/path/to/image.jpg"},"date_live":{"description":"Unix timestamp of when this guide should go live. To release the guide immediately provide the current time along with the `status` 1. If this field is not provided and the `status` is 0, the guide will not be released.","type":"integer","format":"int32","example":1626667557},"name_id":{"description":"Path for the guide on mod.io. For example: https://mod.io/g/gamename/r/__guide-name-id-here__. If no `name_id` is specified the `name` will be used. For example: _'Stellaris Shader Guide'_ will become _'stellaris-shader-guide'_. Cannot exceed 50 characters.","type":"string"},"url":{"description":"Official homepage for your guide. Must be a valid URL.","type":"string"},"tags":{"description":"Tags to apply to the guide. Every tag to apply requires a separate field with tags[] as the key (eg. tags[]=tag1, tags[]=tag2).<br /><br />__NOTE:__ When editing a guide any tags you add or remove from the existing tags list will be added/removed, so if you do not wish to remove any tags you must re-submit all existing tags.","type":"array","items":{"type":"string"}}},"type":"object"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"OK","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"title":"Guide Object","description":"Contains Guide data.","properties":{"id":{"description":"Unique id of the guide.","type":"integer","format":"int32","example":1209},"game_id":{"description":"Unique id of the parent game.","type":"integer","format":"int32","example":3},"game_name":{"description":"Name of the parent game.","type":"string","example":"My Awesome Game"},"logo":{"title":"Logo Object","description":"Contains logo data.","properties":{"filename":{"description":"Logo filename including extension.","type":"string","example":"card.png"},"original":{"description":"URL to the full-sized logo.","type":"string","example":"https://assets.modcdn.io/images/placeholder/card.png"},"thumb_320x180":{"description":"URL to the small logo thumbnail.","type":"string","example":"https://assets.modcdn.io/images/placeholder/card.png"},"thumb_640x360":{"description":"URL to the medium logo thumbnail.","type":"string","example":"https://assets.modcdn.io/images/placeholder/card.png"},"thumb_1280x720":{"description":"URL to the large logo thumbnail.","type":"string","example":"https://assets.modcdn.io/images/placeholder/card.png"}},"type":"object"},"user":{"title":"User Object","description":"Contains user data.","properties":{"id":{"description":"Unique id of the user.","type":"integer","format":"int32","example":1},"name_id":{"description":"Path for the user on mod.io. For example: https://mod.io/u/__name-id-here__","type":"string","example":"xant"},"username":{"description":"Display name of the user.","type":"string","example":"XanT"},"display_name_portal":{"description":"The users' display name for the targeted portal. Value will be `null` if no valid `X-Modio-Portal` portal header value is provided. For more information see [Targeting a Portal](/restapi/platforms#targeting-a-portal).","type":"string","example":null},"date_online":{"description":"Unix timestamp of date the user was last online.","type":"integer","format":"int32","example":1509922961},"date_joined":{"description":"Unix timestamp of date the user joined.","type":"integer","format":"int32","example":1509922961},"avatar":{"title":"Avatar Object","description":"Contains avatar data.","properties":{"filename":{"description":"Avatar filename including extension.","type":"string","example":"avatar.png"},"original":{"description":"URL to the full-sized avatar.","type":"string","example":"https://assets.modcdn.io/images/placeholder/avatar.png"},"thumb_50x50":{"description":"URL to the small avatar thumbnail.","type":"string","example":"https://assets.modcdn.io/images/placeholder/avatar_50x50.png"},"thumb_100x100":{"description":"URL to the medium avatar thumbnail.","type":"string","example":"https://assets.modcdn.io/images/placeholder/avatar_100x100.png"}},"type":"object"},"timezone":{"description":"Deprecated: No longer used and will be removed in subsequent API version.","type":"string","example":""},"language":{"description":"Deprecated: No longer used and will be removed in subsequent API version. To [localize the API response](/restapi/localization) we recommend you set the `Accept-Language` header.","type":"string","example":""},"profile_url":{"description":"URL to the users profile.","type":"string","example":"https://mod.io/u/xant"}},"type":"object"},"date_added":{"description":"Unix timestamp of the date the guide was made.","type":"integer","format":"int32","example":1509922961},"date_updated":{"description":"Unix timestamp of the date the guide was updated.","type":"integer","format":"int32","example":1509922961},"date_live":{"description":"Unix timestamp of the date the guide was set live.","type":"integer","format":"int32","example":1509922961},"status":{"title":"Guide Permission Enum","description":"Status of the guide, see [status and visibility](/restapi/status-and-visibility) for details).","type":"integer","enum":[0,1,3],"example":"1","x-enumDescriptions":{"NOT_ACCEPTED (0)":"Not accepted.","ACCEPTED (1)":"Accepted and live.","DELETED (3)":"Deleted."}},"url":{"description":"URL to the guide.","type":"string","example":"https://mod.io/g/rogue-knight/r/getting-started"},"name":{"description":"The name of the guide","type":"string","example":"Getting Started"},"name_id":{"description":"Path for the guide on mod.io. For example: https://mod.io/g/rogue-knight/r/__getting-started__","type":"string","example":"getting-started"},"summary":{"description":"The summary of the guide","type":"string","example":"Alright, so let's get started with modding on mod.io"},"description":{"description":"Detailed description of the guide (the contents) which allows HTML.","type":"string","example":"<h1>Getting Started</h2><p>Download this suspiciou...."},"community_options":{"title":"Guide Community Options Enum","description":"The bitwise community options that are applied to this guide, allowing or disabling guide comments. Can be one of","type":"integer","enum":[0,2048],"example":"2048","x-enumDescriptions":{"DISABLED (0)":"Disabled","ALLOWS_COMMENTS (2048)":"Allows comments (default)"}},"tags":{"description":"Contains guide tag data.","type":"array","items":{"title":"Guide Tag Object","description":"Contains guide tag data.","properties":{"name":{"description":"Tag name.","type":"string","example":"Instructions"},"date_added":{"description":"Unix timestamp of date tag was applied.","type":"integer","format":"int32","example":1499841487},"count":{"description":"The amount of times this tag has been applied to guides. This value will only be returned for the Get Guide Tags endpoint.","type":"integer","format":"int32","example":22}},"type":"object"}},"stats":{"description":"Contains stats data.","type":"array","items":{"title":"Guide Stats Object","description":"Contains stats data.","properties":{"guide_id":{"description":"Unique guide id.","type":"integer","format":"int32","example":2},"visits_today":{"description":"Last 24hours of visits for this guide","type":"integer","format":"int32","example":0},"visits_total":{"description":"Total number of visits for this guide","type":"integer","format":"int32","example":0},"comments_total":{"description":"Total number of comments for this guide","type":"integer","format":"int32","example":0}},"type":"object"}}},"type":"object"}}}},"403":{"description":"The authenticated user does not have permission to edit guides to this game. Ensure the user is part of the game team before attempting the request again.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"title":"Error Object","description":"Standard API error response.","properties":{"error":{"description":"Contains error data.","properties":{"code":{"description":"The [HTTP code](/restapi/introduction#response-codes).","type":"integer","format":"int32","default":403},"error_ref":{"description":"The mod.io error code.","type":"integer","default":10000},"message":{"description":"The server response to your request. Responses will vary depending on the endpoint, but the object structure will persist.","type":"string","default":"You do not have the required permissions to access this resource."},"errors":{"description":"Optional Validation errors object. This field is only supplied if the response is a validation error `422 Unprocessible Entity`. See [errors documentation](/restapi/errors) for more information.","type":"object"}},"type":"object"}},"type":"object"}}},"x-errorrefs":{"14031":"The guide status cannot be changed to accepted due to the request originating from a non-site admin whilst there is a DMCA report active against the guide.","14036":"The authenticated user does not have permission to edit guides to this game. Ensure the user is part of the game team before attempting the request again."}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
